sql-select.name: GetListOfOperatingSystems
sql-select.sql-select-text: SELECT t.[OperatingSystem] AS [NodeUName] ,t.[OperatingSystem] AS [NodeUId] ,1 AS [NodeEnabled] ,'NodeIcon' AS [NodeUIcon] ,'#080808' AS [NodeFontColor] ,'normal' AS [NodeFontStyle] ,'(operatingSystem=' || t.[OperatingSystem] || ')' AS [OperatingSystemFilter] FROM [hist].[h_ldap_OperatingSystem] t INNER JOIN [hist].[h_ServerInstance] hSI ON hSI.[rowid] = t.[h_ServerInstance_id] AND hSI.[d_ServerInstance_id] = @d_ServerInstance_id WHERE t.[OperatingSystem] IS NOT NULL ORDER BY t.[OperatingSystem] ASC ;
